explains: n. 单簧管，黑管 ；具有类似单簧管音质的管风琴音栓

sentences.en: He went on to study music, specializing in the clarinet.
sentences.cn: 他继续学习音乐，专攻单簧管。

sentences.en: The oboe and the clarinet have certain features in common.
sentences.cn: 双簧管和单簧管有某些共同特点。

sentences.en: She started off playing the recorder and then progressed to the clarinet.
sentences.cn: 她起初吹竖笛，继而吹单簧管。
